title: Group Technical Effects (GTE)
text: GTE quantifies batch effects individual genes single-cell data. suggestions problems package, please contact Y. Zhou (yangz@stu.hit.edu.cn), submit GitHub page directly.

title: Group Technical Effects (GTE)
text: run GTE, install GitHub devtools directly: Installation may take seconds minutes.

title: Group Technical Effects (GTE)
text: usage examples, please see vignettes directory repository. Group technical effects calculation highly technical genes selection also provided several demo datasets, main program may take seconds run standard laptop. codes source data benchmark batch separation metrics please see .

title: Group Technical Effects (GTE)
text: datasets available freely public databases, can also downloaded Zenodo repository.

title: Group Technical Effects (GTE)
text: GTE successfully installed used Windows, Linux Mac OS (R version >= 4.0.2).

title: Compute the group technical effects. — Run.GroupTechEffects
text: X Input data matrix. meta Input metadata (data.frame). g_factor Group variable (s). b_factor Batch variable (s). .scale Whether perform scaling.

Scale data matrix — scale_data
code: scale_data(   data.x,   do.center = T,   do.scale = T,   row.means = NULL,   row.sds = NULL )

title: Scale data matrix — scale_data
text: data.x Input data matrix. .center Whether center row values. (default TRUE) .scale Whether scale row values. (default TRUE) row.means provided row means center. (default NULL) row.sds provided row standard deviations scale. (default NULL)
